overview: Dr. Jonathan Turner has over 20 years experience in the pharmaceutical industry, initially in drug discovery and development in CNS Research at Schering AG, Germany, and subsequently as Global Director, Discovery Alliances in Respiratory and Inflammation at Astrazeneca PLC in UK followed by Global Head of Business Development, with responsibilities across all indications at Boehringer Ingelheim, Germany. Since leaving the industry, Dr. Turner has served as advisor to public funding organizations, and to multiple investors and biotech companies in venture capital-funded biotech and in M&A transactions in the private sector. In addition he has fulfilled operational roles in interim management in international biotech and has served on several supervisory boards. Dr. Turner was educated in UK, graduating with PhD in Neurosciences from St Andrews University.
